task_description:
Refactor custom CSS animations in `index.css` to use `tailwindcss-animate`. 
1. Install `tailwindcss-animate`.
2. Configure `tailwind.config.js` (create if missing).
3. Remove custom `@keyframes` (fadeIn, zoomIn, etc) from `index.css`.
4. Verify `Navigation.tsx` classes work with the new plugin.
